title._content: L[eft] t[o] r[ight] Nellie Carhart, Annie Mead, Lizzie Palmer, sisters (LOC)

description._content: L[eft] t[o] r[ight] Nellie Carhart, Annie Mead, Lizzie Palmer, sisters [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype ; 7.5 x 6.7 cm (plate) Notes: Title from item. Tintype found with tintype of Private Abram M. Carhart of Company C, 177th New York Infantry Regiment, processed as AMB/TIN no. 2244. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (2010:105-5) Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Subjects: Carhart, Abram,--1863--Family. Women--1860-1870. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32473 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2244-A
